episodes.title: Bisola Hephzi-Bah Johnson Q&A Surviving The Cult of TB Joshua
episodes.description:
Join us for a livestream Q&A with Bisola Johnson a survivor and former member of the SCOAN cult of TB Joshua and the global influence the word of faith and prosperity gospel movements have had globally.

Several abusive ministries in the United States and internationally were birthed from TB Joshua including Vlad Savchuck and Hungry Generation as well as Daniel Adams and the Supernatural Life cult.
